title: Sampler, 1824
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: embroidery on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased from Zallio, NY, about 1912. 2002 appraisal #111
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Long form with broad flower and scroll border.  Inside border, geometric pattern bands, a scriptural verse in Spanish, and in the center, a medallion with a painted image of the madonna and child, with an urn of flowers on either side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1824.
1824. Medium: silk, linen
Technique: embroidery on plain weave. Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers. 2003-14-41.
